PropertyList.title: VICKERS
PropertyList.text3: FOR FLIGHTGEAR SIMULATION ONLY
PropertyList.text4: Lake of Constance Hangar Vol. 1.1.5
PropertyList.title: VICKERS
PropertyList.text1:
English ........... page 2 ff
Spanish .......... page 13 ff
German .......... page 24 ff
Czech ............. page 35 ff
Portugues ...... page 46 ff
Italiano ........... page 57 ff
PropertyList.text4: Engine Start Procedure you will find in the Flightgear-Menu /Help/Tutorials
PropertyList.title: MANUAL VC10
PropertyList.text1: EMERGENCY PROC. ENGINE FIRE...............................page 3 RESTART ENGINE......................page 3 ICE WARNING..............................page 4 PRESSURIZATION WARNING....page 5
PropertyList.title: EMERGENCY VC10
PropertyList.text1: Thrust Lever - CLOSE Essential Power Source - CHECK Generator Drive - DISCONNECTED Start Lever - CUTOFF Engine Fire Switch - PULL If fire warning switch extinguished: Engine Fire Switch - PUSH
PropertyList.text3: Do not reconnect Generator Drive Overhead Start Switch - ON Start Lever - ON
PropertyList.text4: If you reconnect Generator Drive in flight you ruin your generator and in worst case your engine, too.
PropertyList.title: EMERGENCY VC10
PropertyList.text1: --------- Overhead Panel ---------- Wing Anti-Ice - ON Nacelle Anti-Ice - ALL ON Window Heat - BOTH HIGH --------- Engineer Panel ---------- Fuel Heaters - ALL ON
PropertyList.text3: Control the Total Air-Temperature TAT - Instrument at Copilot Panel. Minus degree requires ANTI-ICE settings.
PropertyList.title: EMERGENCY VC10
PropertyList.text1: --------- Overhead Panel ---------- Oxygen - ON Seat Belts - ON No Smoking - ON Emer Exit Lights - ON
PropertyList.text2: --------- Engineer Panel ---------- Air Compressors - CHECK Air Cond Unit - BOTH ON Saftey Valve Override - NORMAL Pressurization right switch - AUTO Pressurization left switch - LANDING Rate - MAX DECR Fwd/Aft Valve - NORMAL
PropertyList.title: Normal Porcedures
PropertyList.text1: --------- Engineer Panel ---------- Battery - ON --------- Auxiliary Panel ---------- APU Master - START APU Generator - ON APU Bleed Valve - OPEN --------- Engineer Panel ---------- AC Paralleling - APU Essential Power - APU
PropertyList.text3: --------- Engineer Panel ---------- Essential Power - CHECK --------- Auxiliary Panel ---------- APU Bleed Valve - CLOSE APU Generator - OFF APU Master - OFF
PropertyList.title: Normal Porcedures
PropertyList.text1: --------- Auxiliary Panel ---------- APU Bleed Valve - CLOSE --------- Engineer Panel ---------- Power - ESTABLISH AC Paralleling - CHECK ALL All Breakers - CLOSE
PropertyList.text2: RAM Air - OPEN Air Compressor 2,3,4 - RUN/START Boost Pumps - ALL ON Hydraulic System - CHECK Air Compressor 2,3,4 Indications - CHECK
PropertyList.text3: Air Conditioning Wing Valve - OPEN Air Conditioning Unit - BOTH ON Galley Power - ON APU Master Switch - OFF
PropertyList.text4: Doors - CLOSED Ground Equipment - DISCONNECT
PropertyList.title: Normal Porcedures
PropertyList.text1: --------- Engineer Panel ---------- All lights - ENTIGUISHED Pressurization right switch - AUTO Pressurization left switch - TAKEOFF Altitude - CHECK Cabin Alitude - CHECK
PropertyList.text2: Crew/Main Temp - SELECTED Fuel Heat - ON/OFF
PropertyList.text3: --------- Overhead Panel ---------- Transponder - SET Wing Anti-Ice - ON/OFF Nacelle Anti-Ice - ALL ON/OFF Oxygen - NORM Compass Controller - SET LAT Yaw Dumper - OFF --> continue page 9
PropertyList.title: Normal Porcedures
PropertyList.text1: page 8 - COMPLETE --------- Center Pedestal ---------- All Trimwheels - ZERO Radios - SET FOR DEPARTURE Speedbrake Lever - FULL FORWARD Flaps - TAKEOFF
PropertyList.text2: Thrust Lever - IDLE DETENT Lights - ON Cockpit Door - LOCKED Before Takeoff Checklist - COMPLETE
PropertyList.title: Normal Porcedures
PropertyList.text1: ------- Airplane on runway -------- Transponder - ON Thrust lever - FULL Engines Instruments - MONITOR Call out any abnormailties
PropertyList.text2: Verify 80kts - CALL "80 KNOTS" Verify takeoff kts - CALL "... KNOTS" Verify Vertical Speed - CALL "VS ..."
PropertyList.text3: Call for "GEAR UP" when positive rate of climb is established.
PropertyList.title: Flightgear only
PropertyList.text1: ------- Note -------- Use only one type of autopilot either the regular autopilot in Flightgear Menu
PropertyList.text2: or - the green knobs in center panel or - the original BENDIX PB 20 in center pedestal. If you use all together, its your own responsibility :-))
PropertyList.text3: GPS and autoroute have sometimes problems on win systems with latest Flightgear development versions.
PropertyList.text4: - So switch back to stable release -
PropertyList.title: MANUAL VC10
PropertyList.text1: EMERGENCIA PROC. FUEGO EN MOTOR...................Pag. 14 REINICIO MOTOR/EN VUELO...Pag. 14 ALERTA DE HIELO.....................Pag. 15 ALERTA DE PRESURIZACION..Pag. 16
PropertyList.text2: PROC. NORMALES Arranque APU.............................Pag. 17 Despues iniciar motores............Pag. 18 Antes de Despegar....................Pag. 19ff Despegue.....................................Pag. 21
PropertyList.title: EMERGENCIA VC10
PropertyList.text1: Palanca de Empuje - CERRADA Fuente Esenc. de pot. - COMPROBAR Via del Generador - DESCONECTADA Palanca de Arranque - CORTADA Interr. de Fuego en el Motor - TIRAR Con el interr. de alarma exting.: Interr. de Fuego en el Motor - PRESIONAR
PropertyList.text3: No conectar la via del Generador Interr. Arranque panel superior - ON Palanca de Arranque - ON
PropertyList.text4: Si reconectas la pista del Generador en vuelo estropearas tu generador y en el peor de los casos el motor tambien.
PropertyList.title: EMERGENCICA VC10
PropertyList.text1: --------- Panel Superior ---------- Wing Anti-Ice - ENCENDIDO Canasta Anti hielo - TODOS en ON Calentador de ventana - AMBOS ARRIBA --------- Panel de Ingeniero ---------- Fuel Heaters - TODOS en ON
PropertyList.text3: Controlar el instrumento del TAT Temperatura Total del Aire en el panel de Copiloto. Con grados negativos se requiere ajustar el Sistema Anti Hielo.
PropertyList.title: EMERGENCIA VC10
PropertyList.text1: --------- Panel Superior ---------- Oxigeno - ENCENDIDO Seat Belts - ENCENDIDO No Smoking - ENCENDIDO Emer Exit Lights - ENCENDIDO
PropertyList.text2: --------- Panel de Ingeniero ---------- Air Compressors - COMPROBAR Air Cond Unit - AMBOS en ON Safety Valve Override - NORMAL Interr. presur. derecho - AUTO Interr. presur. izquierdo - LANDING Rate - max. DECR Fwd/Aft Valve - NORMAL
PropertyList.text4: ------------------------------------------ Descenso de Emergencia - INICIAR La compensación de presión puede variar dependiendo de la altura y tardar hasta 10 minutos.
PropertyList.title: Proc. Normales
PropertyList.text1: --------- Panel de Ingeniero ---------- Bateria - ENCENDIDO --------- Panel Auxiliar ---------- APU Master - START APU Generator - ENCENDIDO APU Bleed Valve - ABRIR --------- Panel de Ingeniero ---------- AC Paralleling - APU Essential Power - APU
PropertyList.text3: --------- Panel de Ingeniero ---------- Essential Power - COMPROBAR --------- Panel Auxiliar ---------- APU Bleed Valve - CERRAR APU Generator - APAGADO APU Master - APAGADO
PropertyList.title: Proc. Normales
PropertyList.text1: --------- Panel Auxiliar ---------- APU Bleed Valve - CERRAR --------- Panel de Ingeniero ---------- Power - ESTABLECER AC Paralleling - COMPROBAR All Breakers - CERRAR
PropertyList.text2: RAM Air - ABIERTO Air Compressor 2,3,4 - RUN/START Boost Pumps - TODAS EN ON Hydraulic System - COMPROBAR Indicadores Air Compressor 2,3,4 - COMPROBAR
PropertyList.text3: Air Conditioning Wing Valve - ABRIR Air Conditioning Unit - AMBOS en ON Galley Power - ENCENDIDO APU Master Switch - APAGADO
PropertyList.text4: Puertas - CERRADAS Equipamiento en Tierra - DESCONECTADO
PropertyList.title: Proc. Normales
PropertyList.text1: --------- Panel de Ingeniero ---------- Todas las luces - APAGADAS Interr. de presur. derecho - AUTO Interr. de presur. izquierdo - TAKEOFF Altitud - COMPROBAR Cabin Altitud - COMPROBAR
PropertyList.text2: Crew/Main Temp - SELECCIONADO Fuel Heat - ON/OFF
PropertyList.text3: --------- Panel Superior ---------- Transpondedor - AJUSTAR Wing Anti-Ice - ON/OFF Nacelle Anti-Ice - Todos ON/OFF Oxigeno - NORM Compass Controller - AJUSTAR LAT Yaw Dumper - APAGADO --> continua en pagina 20
PropertyList.title: Proc. Normales
PropertyList.text1: page 19 - COMPLETA --------- Center Pedestal ---------- Ruedas de Trimado - TODAS A CERO Radios - AJUSTAR PARA SALIDA Palanca de Aerofreno - AVANTE TODA Flaps - TAKEOFF
PropertyList.text2: Palanca de Empuje - MANTENER EN IDLE Luces - ENCENDIDAS Puerta de Cabina - CERRADA Chequeo previo al despegue - COMPLETADO
PropertyList.title: Proc. Normales
PropertyList.text1: ------- Con aeronave en pista -------- Transpondedor - ENCENDIDO Palanca de Empuje - A TOPE Indicadores de motor - MONITORIZAR Gritar si hay alguna anomalia
PropertyList.text2: Verificar 80kts - GRITAR "80 KNOTS" Verificar V de despegue - GRITAR "... KNOTS" Verificar Velocidad Vertical - GRITAR "VS ..."
PropertyList.text3: Gritar "TREN ARRIBA" cuando se establezca una tasa positiva de ascenso.
PropertyList.title: Solo en Flightgear
PropertyList.text1: ------- Nota -------- Puedes usar solo el Autopiloto normal de Flightgear del Menu Flightgear. o - los botones verdes del panel central
PropertyList.text2: o - el BENDIX PB 2020 original en el pedestal central. Si utilizas todos juntos, es tu responsabilidad :-))
PropertyList.text3: GPS y Autoroute a veces tienen problemas en sistemas windows con la última version de desarrollo de Flightgear.
PropertyList.text4: - Por tanto cambia a una version estable -
PropertyList.title: MANUAL VC10
PropertyList.text1: NOTFALL PROZEDUREN TRIEBWERK FEUER.....................S. 25 NEUSTART TRIEBWERK..............S. 25 EIS WARNUNG..............................S. 26 KABINENDRUCK WARNUNG.......S. 27
PropertyList.title: NOTFALL VC10
PropertyList.text1: Schubhebel - ZURUECK Essential Power - KONTROLLE Generator Drive - AUS Cutoff Hebel - AUS Triebwerk Feuerhebel - ZIEHEN Wenn Lampe erlischt: Triebwerk Feuerhebel - DRUECKEN
PropertyList.text3: Niemals Generator Drive einschalten Overhead Start Schalter - EIN Cutoff Hebel - EIN
PropertyList.text4: Ein Wiedereinschalten des Generatoren- getriebes im Flug, bei rotierender Turbine, zerstoert das Getriebe und eventuell das Triebwerk.
PropertyList.title: NOTFALL VC10
PropertyList.text1: --------- Overhead Panel ---------- Wing Anti-Ice - EIN Nacelle Anti-Ice - ALLE EIN Window Heat - BEIDE AUF HIGH --------- Engineer Panel ---------- Fuel Heaters - ALLE EIN
PropertyList.text3: Beobachten Sie waehrend des Fluges das TAT (Total Air-Temperature) Instrument im Copiloten Panel. Minus Temperaturen erfordern die Enteisungseinstellungen.
PropertyList.title: NOTFALL VC10
PropertyList.text1: --------- Overhead Panel ---------- Oxygen - EIN Seat Belts - EIN No Smoking - EIN Emer Exit Lights - EIN
PropertyList.text2: --------- Engineer Panel ---------- Air Compressors - KONTROLLE Air Cond Unit - BEIDE AN Saftey Valve Override - NORMAL Pressurization right switch - AUTO Pressurization left switch - LANDING Rate - max. DECR Fwd/Aft Valve - NORMAL
PropertyList.text4: ------------------------------------------ Notfall Sinkflug - EINLEITEN Druckausgleich kann je nach Hoehe bis zu 10min dauern.
PropertyList.title: Normale Prozeduren
PropertyList.text1: --------- Engineer Panel ---------- Batterie - AN --------- Auxiliary Panel ---------- APU Master - START APU Generator - ON APU Bleed Valve - OPEN --------- Engineer Panel ---------- AC Paralleling - APU Essential Power - APU
PropertyList.text3: --------- Engineer Panel ---------- Essential Power - KONTROLLE --------- Auxiliary Panel ---------- APU Bleed Valve - CLOSE APU Generator - OFF APU Master - OFF
PropertyList.title: Normale Prozeduren
PropertyList.text1: --------- Auxiliary Panel ---------- APU Bleed Valve - CLOSE --------- Engineer Panel ---------- Power - BESTEHEND AC Paralleling - KONTROLLE All Breakers - CLOSE
PropertyList.text2: RAM Air - OPEN Air Compressor 2,3,4 - RUN/START Boost Pumps - ALL ON Hydraulic System - KONTROLLE Air Compressor 2,3,4 Indications - KONTROLLE
PropertyList.text3: Air Conditioning Wing Valve - OPEN Air Conditioning Unit - BEIDE AN Galley Power - ON APU Master Switch - OFF
PropertyList.text4: Tueren - GESCHLOSSEN Boden Equipment - ENTFERNT
PropertyList.title: Normale Prozeduren
PropertyList.text1: --------- Engineer Panel ---------- Alle Kontrollleuchten - AUS Pressurization rechts - AUTO Pressurization links - TAKEOFF Altitude - KONTROLLE Cabin Alitude - KONTROLLE
PropertyList.text2: Crew/Main Temp - WAEHLEN Fuel Heat - ON/OFF
PropertyList.text3: --------- Overhead Panel ---------- Transponder - EINGESTELLT Wing Anti-Ice - ON/OFF Nacelle Anti-Ice - ALLE ON/OFF Oxygen - NORM Compass Controller - LAT EINSTELLEN Yaw Dumper - OFF --> weiter auf Seite 31
PropertyList.title: Normale Prozeduren
PropertyList.text1: Seite 30 - OK --------- Center Pedestal ---------- All Trimwheels - NULL Radios - EINGESTELLT Speedbrake Lever - VORNE Flaps - TAKEOFF
PropertyList.text2: Thrust Lever - IDLE HALTEN Lights - ON Cockpit Door - VERSCHLOSSEN Before Takeoff Checklist - BEENDET
PropertyList.title: Normale Prozeduren
PropertyList.text1: ----- Flugzeug auf Startbahn ------ Transponder - ON Schubhebel - VOLL Triebwerk Instrumente - BEACHTEN Jede Ausnahme laut ausrufen.
PropertyList.text2: Beachte 80kts - AUSRUF "80 KNOTS" Beachte Abhebe kts - AUSRUF "... KNOTS" Beachte Steigrate - AUSRUF "VS ..."
PropertyList.text3: AUSRUF "GEAR UP" wenn positive Steigrate erreicht ist.
PropertyList.title: Flightgear speziell
PropertyList.text1: ------- Hinweis -------- Benutzen Sie nur entweder - oder ... den regulaeren Flightgear Autopilot im Flightgear Menue.
PropertyList.text2: oder - die gruenen Knoepfe im Panel oder - den original BENDIX PB 20 im center pedestal. Wenn Sie alles durcheinander nutzen, kann es zu Fehlern fuehren :-))
PropertyList.text3: GPS und Autorouten haben manchmal Probleme mit den letzen Flightgear Versionen unter Windows.
PropertyList.text4: - Nutzen Sie dann die letzte FG Version -
PropertyList.title: MANUAL VC10
PropertyList.text1: PRIPAD NOUZE POZAR MOTORU............................p. 36 RESTART. MOTORU ZA LETU....p. 36 VAROVANI PRED NAMRAZOU.....p. 37 VAROVANI PRI POKLESU TLAKU V KABINE.............................................p. 38
PropertyList.title: PRIPAD NOUZE VC10
PropertyList.text1: Pripuste motoru - ZAVRENO Nezbytny zdroj - ZKONTROLUJ Generator- ODPOJENO Paka napojeni paliva - ODPOJENO Tahlo pozaru motoru- POTAHNI Jestlize tahlo pozaru zhasne a pozar je uhasen: Tahlo pozaru motoru - POTLAC
PropertyList.text3: Nezapinejte znovu generator Starter - ZAPNUTO Paka napojeni paliva - ZAPNUTO
PropertyList.text4: Jestlize zapnete za letu generator, muzete jej znicit a v nejhorsim pripade i znicit motor.
PropertyList.title: PRIPAD NOUZE VC10
PropertyList.text1: --------- NAHLAVNI PANEL---------- Namraza na kridlech- ZAPNUTO Namraza motoru – VSECHNY ZAPNUTO Vyhrivani oken - VYSOKÝ VÝKON --------- Inzenyrsky panel ---------- Vyhrivani paliva - ZAPNUTO
PropertyList.text3: Kontroluj teplotu venkovniho vzduchu TAT – zarizeni na panelu kopilota V pripade minusovych hodnot je vyzadovano nastaveni proti namraze
PropertyList.title: PRIPAD NOUZE VC10
PropertyList.subtitle1: VAROVANI PRI POKLESU TLAKU V KABINE
PropertyList.text1: --------- Nahlavni panel ---------- Kyslik - ZAPNUTO Bezpecnostni pasy - ZAPNUTO Zakaz koureni- ZAPNUTO Nouzova únikova svetla - ZAPNUTO
PropertyList.text2: --------- Inzenyrsky panel---------- Kyslikovy kompresor - ZKONTROLUJ Klimatizace – OBE ZAPNUTO Bezpecnostni ventil – NORMALNI Natlakovani, pravy prepinac - AUTO Natlakovani, levy prepinac - PRISTANI Hodnota tlaku – MAXIMALNI SNIZENI Predni/zadni ventil - NORMALNI
PropertyList.title: Normalni procedury
PropertyList.text1: --------- Inzenyrsky panel---------- Baterie - ZAPNUTO --------- Pomocny panel---------- APU Hlavni vypinac - START APU Generator - ZAPNUTO APU Pruchozi ventil - OTEVENO --------- Inzenyrsky panel ---------- AC Paralelni - APU Nezbytny zdroj energie - APU
PropertyList.text3: --------- Inzenyrsky panel---------- Nezbytny zdroj energie - ZKONTROLUJ --------- Pomocny panel ---------- APU Pruchozi ventil - ZAVRI APU Generator - VYPNUTO APU Hlavni vypinac - VYPNUTO
PropertyList.title: Normalni procedury
PropertyList.text1: --------- Pomocny panel---------- APU Pruchozi ventil - ZAVRENO --------- Inzenyrsky panel---------- Zdroj energie- USTALEN AC Paralelni – VSECHNY ZKONTROL Vsechny pojistky - ZAVRENO
PropertyList.text2: RAM kyslik - OTEV?ENO Kyslikovy kompresor 2,3,4 - BEZI/START Pidavne pumpy – VSECHNY ZAPNUTY Hydraulicke systemy- ZKONTROLUJ Kyslikovy kompresor 2,3,4 Indikovano -
PropertyList.text3: ZKONTROL Ventil klimatizace v kridle - OTEVRENO Klimatizace- OBE ZAPNUTY
PropertyList.text4: Zavisly zdroj - ZAPNUTO APU hlavni vypinac - VYPNUTO Dvere - ZAVRENY Pozemni vybaveni - ODPOJENO
PropertyList.title: Normalni procedury
PropertyList.text1: --------- Inzenyrsky panel ---------- Vsechny svetla - ZAPNUTY Natlakovani, pravy prepinac - AUTOMATICKY Natlakovani, levy prepinac - VZLET Vyskomer - ZKONTROLUJ
PropertyList.text2: Vyska kabiny - ZKONTROLUJ Posadka/Hlavni topeni - VYBRANO Vyhrivani paliva – ZAPNUTO/VYPNUTO
PropertyList.text3: --------- Nahlavni panel---------- Transponder - NASTAVEN Vyhrivani kridla- ZAPNUTO/VYPNUTO Vyhrivani motoru - VSECHNY ZAPNUTO/VYPNUTO Kyslik- NASTAVENO NA - NORMALNE Kompas – NASTAVENO LAT. Yaw Dumper - VYPNUTO -> pokracuj stranka 42
PropertyList.title: Normalni procedury
PropertyList.text1: stranka 41 - KOMPLETNI --------- Centralni pedestal ---------- Vsechny trimy- NULA Radio – NASTAVENO PRO ODLET Brzdove paky – PLNE VPREDU Klapky - VZLET
PropertyList.text2: Pripuste motoru- VOLNOBEH Svetla - ZAPNUTO Dvere kokpitu - ZAMKNUTY Kontrola pred vzletem - KOMPLETNI
PropertyList.title: Normalni procedury
PropertyList.text1: ------- Letadlo na ranveji -------- Transponder - ZAPNUTO Pripuste motoru – PLNÝ TAH Pristroje motoru- MONITORUJ Upozorni na jakoukoli abnormalitu!
PropertyList.text2: Over 80 uzlu - ZVOLEJ "80 KNOTS" Over vzletova rychlost - ZVOLEJ"... KNOTS" Over vertikalni rychlost- ZVOLEJ "VS ..."
PropertyList.text3: Zvolej "ZATAHNOUT PODVOZEK" kdyz je potvrzeno stoupani
PropertyList.title: Flightgear pouze
PropertyList.text1: ------- Mej na pameti -------- Pouzij buď bezny autopilot ve Flightgearu v Menu.
PropertyList.text2: nebo – nebo zelene tlacitka na centralnim panelu nebo – originalni BENDIX PB 20 na centralnim panelu Jestlize pouzijes vsechny naraz, je to
PropertyList.text3: na tvoji zodpovednost. :-) GPS a auto trasa maji nekdy problem s posledni verzi FG a Windows
PropertyList.text4: - Tak pouzij posledni stabilni verzi -
PropertyList.title: Manual VC10
PropertyList.text1: EMERGENCIA PROC. FOGO NO MOTOR.....................Pag. 47 REINICIAR O MOTOR/VOO.......Pag. 47 AVISO DE GELO........................Pag. 48 AVISO DE PRESSURIZACAO...Pag. 49
PropertyList.text2: Procedimentos Normais Inicio APU....................................Pag. 50 Depois de Iniciar Motores.........Pag. 51 Antes da Decolagem..................Pag. 52/3 Decolagem....................................Pag. 54
PropertyList.text3: Piloto Automatico.........................Pag. 55
PropertyList.title: EMERGENCIA VC10
PropertyList.text1: Alavanca de empuxe - Fechar Fonte de energia essencial - Checar Unidade de Gerador - Desconectada Alavanca Iniciar- Cortar Chave de fogo no motor - Puxar Se a luz de aviso de incendio apagar: Chave de fogo do motor - Empurrar
PropertyList.text3: Não reconectar a unidade gerador Interruptor do Painel Superior - ON Alavanca Iniciar - ON
PropertyList.text4: Se voce reconectar a unidade gerador em voo voce arruinara seu gerador e em pior caso, seu motor tambem.
PropertyList.title: EMERGENCIA VC10
PropertyList.text1: --------- Painel Superior ---------- Anti-gelo de asa- ON Nacelle Anti-gelo- Todos ON Window Heat - AMBOS ACIMA --------- Painel do Engenheiro ---------- Aquecedores de combustivel(Fuel Heaters) - Todos ON
PropertyList.text3: Controlar o instrumento TAT - emperatura total do ar no painel do co-piloto com graus negativos requer ajustes no Sistema Anti-Gelo
PropertyList.title: EMERGENCIA VC10
PropertyList.text1: --------- Painel Superior ---------- Oxigenio(oxygen) - Ligado Seguranca(Seat Belts) - Ligado Nao fume(No Smoking) - Ligado L.de saida de emerg.(Emer Exit Lights)- Ligado
PropertyList.text2: ------- PAINEL DO ENGENHEIRO ------- Compress. de Ar - CHECAR Unid.de Ar Condicion. - AMBOS ON Safety Valve Override - NORMAL Interr.direito de Pressur. - AUTO Interr.esquerdo de Pressur. - LANDING Rate - MAX DECR Fwd/Aft Valve - NORMAL
PropertyList.text4: ------------------------------------------ Descida de emergencia - INICIAR A Compensação de pressao pode variar dependendo da altura e levar ate 10 minutos.
PropertyList.title: Procedimentos Normais
PropertyList.text1: ------- Painel do Engenheiro ------ Bateria -Ligada ------- Painel Auxiliar ------ APU Master - START APU Generator - Ligado APU Bleed Valve - Abrir ------- Painel do Engenheiro ------ AC Paralleling - APU Essential Power - APU
PropertyList.text3: --------- Painel do Engenheiro ---------- Essential Power - Checar --------- Painel Auxiliar ---------- APU Bleed Valve - Fechar APU Generator - Desligado APU Master - Desligado
PropertyList.title: Procedimentos Normais
PropertyList.text1: --------- Painel Auxiliar ---------- APU Bleed Valve - Fechar --------- Painel de Engenheiro ---------- Power - Estabelecer AC Paralleling - Checar todos All Breakers - Fechar
PropertyList.text2: RAM Air - Aberto Air Compressor 2,3,4 - RUN/START Boost Pumps - Todas Ligadas Hydraulic System - Checar Ind. Compressor de Ar 2,3,4 - Checar
PropertyList.text3: Air Conditioning Wing Valve - Abrir Air Conditioning Unit - Ambos Ligados Galley Power - Ligado APU Master Switch - Desligado
PropertyList.text4: Portas - Fechadas Equipamento de solo - Desconectado
PropertyList.title: Procedimentos Normais
PropertyList.text1: --------- Painel do Engenheiro ---------- Todas Luzes - Apagadas Int. Pressur. direito - AUTO Int. Pressur. esquerdo - Takeoff Altitude - Checar Cabin Altitude - Checar
PropertyList.text2: Crew/Main Temp - Selecionado Fuel Heat - ON/OFF
PropertyList.text3: --------- Painel Superior ---------- Transponder - Ajustar Wing Anti-Ice - ON/OFF Nacelle Anti-Ice - Todos ON/OFF Oxigenio - NORMAL Compass Controller - Ajuste LAT Yaw Dumper - Desligado --> continue page 53
PropertyList.title: Procedimentos Normais
PropertyList.text1: page 52 - COMPLETE ------- Pedestal de Centro ------- Todas rodas de guarnicao(All Trimwheels) - ZERO Radios - Ajuste para saida Speedbrake Lever - Toda a frente Flaps - Decolagem
PropertyList.text3: Manete(Thrust Lever) - Manter IDLE Luzes - Acesas Porta da cabine - Fechada Checagem antes da decolagem - Completo
PropertyList.title: Procedimentos Normais
PropertyList.text1: ------- Aviao na Pista -------- Transponder - Ligado Manete(Thrust lever) - Todo a frente(FULL) Instrumentos de Motores - Monitorar Chamar se houver qualquer anomalia
PropertyList.text2: Verif. 80kts - Chamar "80 KNOTS" Verif. takeoff kts - Chamar "... KNOTS" Verif. Vertical Speed - Chamar "VS ..."
PropertyList.text3: Chamar "Engrenagem para cima" quando for estabelecida taxa positiva de subida
PropertyList.title: Somente Flightgear
PropertyList.text1: ------- Nota -------- Use apenas o tipo de piloto automatico regular no Menu Flightgear
PropertyList.text2: ou - botoes verdes o centro do painel ou - BENDIX PB 20 original no pedestal central Se voce usar todos juntos, a responsabilidade e sua :-))
PropertyList.text3: GPS e autoroute as vezes tem problemas em Sistemas Windows com a ultima versao de desenvolvimento do Flightgear
PropertyList.text4: - Entao retorne a versao estavel -
PropertyList.title: MANUALE VC10
PropertyList.text1: PROCEDURE D'EMERGENZA INCENDIO MOTORE.....................pag. 58 RIAVVIAMENTO MOTORE...........pag. 58 ALLARME GHIACCIO....................pag. 59 ALLARME PRESSURIZZAZIONE.pag. 60
PropertyList.text2: PROCEDURE NORMALI Avviamento APU (unita energia ausiliare)..........pag. 61 Post-avviamento motori...........pag. 62 Prima del decollo....................pag. 63/64
PropertyList.title: EMERGENZA VC10
PropertyList.text1: Leva propulsione - CHIUSA (indietro) Essential Power Source - CHECK Generator Drive - SCOLLEGATO Cutoff Lever - INTERROTTO Engine Fire Switch - TIRARE Se l'allarme incendio cessa: Engine Fire Switch - SPINGERE
PropertyList.text3: Non ripristinare Generator Drive (connessione al generatore) Overhead Start Switch - ON Cutoff Lever - ON (abbassata)
PropertyList.text4: Ricollegando il Generator Drive in volo, si rovinerebbe il generatore e nel peggiore dei casi anche il motore.
PropertyList.title: EMERGENZA VC10
PropertyList.text1: --------- Pannello soffitto cabina ---------- Wing Anti-Ice - ON Nacelle Anti-Ice - tutti ON Window Heat - entrambi HIGH --------- Pannello motorista ---------- Fuel Heaters - tutti ON
PropertyList.text3: Controllare lo strumento TAT nel pannello del copilota (Total Air Temperature). In caso di valore negativo sono necessarie regolazioni ANTI-ICE (antighiaccio).
PropertyList.title: EMERGENZA VC10
PropertyList.text1: --------- Pannello soffitto cabina ---------- Oxygen (ossigeno) - ON Seat Belts (cinture di sicurezza) - ON No Smoking (non fumare) - ON Emer Exit Lights (luci di salita d'emergenza) - ON
PropertyList.text2: --------- Pannello motorista ---------- Air Compressors - CHECK Air Cond Unit - entrambi ON Saftey Valve Override - NORMAL Pressurization: interruttore destro - AUTO Pressurization: interruttore sinistro - LANDING Rate (tasso) - MAX DECR Fwd/Aft Valve - NORMAL
PropertyList.title: Procedure Normali
PropertyList.text1: --------- Pannello motorista ---------- Battery - ON --------- Pannello ausiliario ---------- APU Master - START APU Generator - ON APU Bleed Valve - OPEN --------- Pannello motorista ---------- AC Paralleling - APU Essential Power - APU
PropertyList.text3: --------- Pannello motorista ---------- Essential Power - CHECK --------- Pannello ausiliario ---------- APU Bleed Valve - CLOSE APU Generator - OFF APU Master - OFF
PropertyList.title: Procedure Normali
PropertyList.text1: --------- Pannello ausiliario ---------- APU Bleed Valve - CLOSE --------- Pannello motorista ---------- Elettricità - ATTIVARE AC Paralleling - tutti CHECK Breakers - tutti CLOSE
PropertyList.text2: RAM Air - OPEN Air Compressor 2,3,4 - RUN/START Boost Pumps - tutte ON Hydraulic System - CHECK Air Compressor 2,3,4 indicazioni - CHECK
PropertyList.text3: Air Conditioning Wing Valve - OPEN Air Conditioning Unit - entrambe ON Galley Power (elettricita cambusa) - ON APU Master Switch - OFF
PropertyList.text4: Porte - CHIUSE Equipaggiamento sulla pista - SCOLLEGARE
PropertyList.title: Procedure Normali
PropertyList.text1: --------- Pannello motorista ---------- Tutte le luci - SPENTE Pressuriz. interr. destro - AUTO Pressuriz. interr. sinistro - TAKEOFF Altimetro - CHECK Altimetro di cabina - CHECK
PropertyList.text2: Crew/Main Temp - SELECTED Fuel Heat - ON/OFF
PropertyList.text3: --------- Pannello soffitto ---------- Transponder - SET Wing Anti-Ice - ON/OFF Nacelle Anti-Ice - ALL ON/OFF Oxygen - NORM Compass Controller - SET LAT Yaw Damper - OFF --> continue page 64
PropertyList.title: Procedure Normali
PropertyList.text1: page 63 - COMPLETE --------- Colonna centrale ---------- Tutti i comandi TRIM - ZERO Radio - REGOLARE PER LA PARTENZA Comando aerofreno - TUTTO AVANTI
PropertyList.text2: Flaps - TAKEOFF Leva propulsione - IDLE DETENT Luci - ON
PropertyList.text3: Porta cabina pilotaggio - CHIUSA Checklist pre decollo - COMPLETA
PropertyList.title: Procedure Normali
PropertyList.text1: ------- Aeroplano in pista -------- Transponder - ON Leva propulsione - AL MASSIMO Strumenti dei motori - CONTROLLARE Menzionare a voce alta qualunque anormaliltà.
PropertyList.text2: Verifica 80kts - DIRE "80 NODI" Verifica velocità decollo - DIRE "... KNOTS" Verifica velocità verticale - DIRE "VS ..."
PropertyList.text3: Dire "GEAR UP" (ritrarre carrello) quando si sia stabilito un tasso di ascesa positivo.
PropertyList.title: Solo FlightGear
PropertyList.text1: ------- Note -------- Usare solo un tipo alla volta di pilota automatico, o il pilota automatico standard del menu FlightGear oppure - la manopola verde nel pannello centrale
PropertyList.text2: oppure - il BENDIX PB 20 originale nella colonna centrale. Se li usi insieme, e sotto la tua responsabilita :-))
PropertyList.text3: Il GPS e l'autoroute (itinerario automatico) hanno a volte problemi su sistemi Win con le
PropertyList.text4: piu recenti versioni in sviluppo di FlightGear. - In caso, ritorna all'ultima versione stabile.
